title: Chicken with Pomegranate & Herbs (Fesenjan-Inspired) — Foodie Fuel

ingredients.item: spinach, herbs or lentils as appropriate

method: Heat olive oil gently in a wide pan over medium heat.
Cook onion slowly for 10 minutes until soft and lightly golden.
Add garlic and spices; cook gently until fragrant.
Add the chicken thigh fillets and cook until sealed and just cooked through (15–25 minutes depending on cut).
Fold through greens or lentils and warm gently.
Finish with lemon juice or pomegranate molasses and fresh herbs.
plating: Serve in a shallow bowl, protein arranged neatly with herbs scattered and a light gloss of oil.
swaps: Swap herbs seasonally; use barberries if available.
optional_finishes: Crushed walnuts or dried rose petals.

diabetesUK.notes: Diabetes-friendly tagging aligned with Diabetes UK style guidance when portioned as specified.

notes: Uses olive, coconut, or avocado oil only. No seed oils.
